traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.desc: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Limited Amphibiousness
traits.desc: The sahuagin can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

traits.name: Shark Telepathy
traits.desc: The sahuagin can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The sahuagin is a 6th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). She has the following cleric spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): guidance, thaumaturgy * 1st level (4 slots): bless, detect magic, guiding bolt * 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon (trident) * 3rd level (3 slots): mass healing word, tongues

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sahuagin makes two melee attacks: one with her bite and one with her claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.
